message: Bob, I have a unique product that I believe would be of great value to you. I'm offering it to you for $1000000. I'm confident this is a fair price considering the potential it holds. Let me know your thoughts.

Thank you for your offer, Alice. I appreciate the value you see in the product. However, my budget allows me to spend up to $800000 for this item. I hope we can come to an agreement that works for both of us.
